title: Shadow and Act - summarizes the effect

content.prompt: Which of the following statements most accurately summarizes the effect of the third sentence in paragraph 4?

choices.label: The numerous abstractions provide a startling contrast to the preceding sentence.
The irony of the sentence highlights the complexity of Parker's music.
The complexity of the sentence's structure mirrors the complexity of Parker's music.
The extensive use of prepositions underscores the repetitiveness of Parker's style.

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
